attributes.action: Government to adress parliament on military strikes in Syria
attributes.additional_details: Theresa may has just introduced a military offensive against Syria's President Al Assad. No doubt thousands of of lives will be lost... support our cause against this foolish decision...
attributes.background: Theresa May has authorised British armed forces to conduct and coordinate targeted strikes on the Syrian regime, no doubt risking civilians lives and livelihoods. Claiming she is acting together with French and American allies.

rejection.details:
The Prime Minister made a statement to Parliament on Monday 16 April. You can find out more here:

https://www.parliament.uk/business/news/2018/april/statement-syria-16-april-2018/
